The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that an alien organism called Vaterra has killed them and turned them into camouflage monsters that never stop moving. Unfortunately for our heroes, they have already been infected and become one too. They turn on their own co-workers until only two are left to battle the creatures.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to create a cult phenomenon like the John Ashley Bruce Li martial arts films of the Sixties and Seventies. A TV series is also forthcoming with Hatekoff once again playing Joe but beside a beautiful co-star instead of Holly Gagnier.
